name: Nintendo Touch Golf - Birdie Challenge [NDS]
description:
Ignite the Fantasy Fairway!
Time to meet all-new golf!

A whole new fantasy golf game available only in Birdie Crush!
Visit Delion Bridge, a magical golf school where charming characters await!

Birdie Crush Introduction

■ Fantasy golf you can't find anywhere else ■
Fantasy golf with beautiful 3D graphics and gorgeous course-specific skills!
Go on a variety of field trips with adorable caddies!

■ Realistic hitting effects! ■
Try a hole-in-one with an exhilarating perfect shot!
Strategize, aim for the right timing and swing to clear various courses!

■ Easy and simple controls ■
Play golf with single taps!
Enjoy auto feature supported for the first time ever in the golf game and dynamic shots with simulation mode!

■ Compete with players all around the world ■
Challenge yourself in a global live match!
Show off your skills and win!

■ Enjoy campus life with various characters! ■
Follow the story of the characters unfolding in Delion Bridge!
Customize characters with colorful costumes and check out the hidden stories and exclusive animations!

A casual fantasy golf game for not just golf lovers but for everyone!

■ Official Birdie Crush Website ■
- Official Community: :https://www.facebook.com/BirdieCrush
- Official YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/BirdieCrushFantasyGolf

▶Birdie Crush is available in 11 different languages!
English, 한국어, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Deutsch, Français, Español, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano and ไทย!◀

Device App Access Permission Notice

▶ Notice per access permission
Access permissions are requested in order for us to provide you with the following service when you use the app.

[Required]
None

[Optional]
- Notifications: The permission is required to send you push notifications regarding the game.
- Camera: The permission is required to take profile pictures for HIVE members.
- Contacts: The permission is required to find friends registered to contacts for HIVE members.
- Photos: The permission is required to save/load game screens and change profile pictures for HIVE members.
- Location: Used to search for nearby friends.
※ Please note that you can still enjoy the service excluding features related to the above without giving access permissions.

▶ How to remove access permissions
You can always change access permission settings whenever you'd like.

- Device Settings> Select the corresponding app> Choose either to enable/disable access
